title: Tech Mahindra Q4 Preview | Profit may grow 30% and revenue 24% - Moneycontrol
content: Tech Mahindra Q4 Preview | Profit may grow 30% and revenue 24%  Moneycontrol
description: Experts expect the rise in employee attrition and travel costs to impact EBITDA margins, which are likely to shrink by around 235 bps on year and 35 bps on quarter to 17.6 percent
